channel.title: 2moons
channel.description:
If any of you have ever played the game, I need some help. I downloaded the game to primarily get away from RuneScape, but every time I try to launch the game from my desktop or from the game site itself, a little box pops up and says "minilauncher could not operate because a program was blocking it". If anybody could help me fix the problem, I would be very grateful.
By the way, i don't know if this affects the problem, but I run Vista on my computer. There may be a default program on my laptop that's blocking the launch of the game, but I don't know exactly.

item.title: 2moons
item.dc:creator: @phonnygoblin phonnygoblin
item.description:
@phonnygoblin wrote:

Right click the application and press run as admin.

Read full topic

item.title: 2moons
item.dc:creator: @nicatron nicatron
item.description:
@nicatron wrote:

Chimaera God:

How could I disable the firewall? I don’t know how to…

open the Security Center and right click the firewall and open then find a disable. This may not work, I have XP not vista.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Chimaera_God Chimaera God
item.description:
@Chimaera_God wrote:

How could I disable the firewall? I don’t know how to…

item.title: 2moons
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Vista’s Firewall is probably blocking it…

Read full topic

item.title: 2moons
item.dc:creator: @Chimaera_God Chimaera God
item.description:
@Chimaera_God wrote:

Well, that’d the thing though. I haven’t installed any protection program on my laptop yet, since I just got it about two days ago. So there should be no reason why the game launcher is being blocked.

Read full topic

item.title: 2moons
item.dc:creator: @sidishere sidishere
item.description:
@sidishere wrote:

maybe the firewall was blocking it?

Read full topic

item.title: 2moons
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

My first guess would be some type of anti-virus, which has done something similar to this to me before, simply try temporarily disabling any anti-virus programs you have to see if it will run then. Otherwise post somewhere that people know more about the game itself as someone else is sure to have the same problem.

Read full topic
